data.title: Who is Emmy Rossum's husband Sam Esmail?
data.meta_description: EMMY Rossum shot to fame as the straight-talking Fiona on Showtime's Shameless.Since then she has seen the roles flooding in, but behind closed doors,
data.text:
EMMY Rossum shot to fame as the straight-talking Fiona on Showtime's Shameless.

Since then she has seen the roles flooding in, but behind closed doors, she enjoys a cozy life with husband, Sam Esmail.

Who is Emmy Rossum's husband Sam Esmail?

Born on September 17, 1977, 44-year-old Sam Esmail is an American film and television producer, director, and screenwriter.

He runs the production company, Esmail Corp.

Sam is best known as the creator, writer, and director of the TV show Mr. Robot (2015‚Äì2019), starring Rami Malek.

He also directed and produced the acclaimed Amazon Prime Video psychological thriller series, Homecoming, starring Julia Roberts.

When did Sam marry Emmy?

The couple began dating back in 2013.

The happy pair became engaged in 2015 after Sam popped the question to the actress following two years of dating.

They later tied the knot in May 2017 at an intimate ceremony held at the Central Synagogue in New York City, which was followed by a lavish reception at the Guggenheim Museum.

When did the couple reveal they had a baby?

On May 25, 2021, the couple revealed they had welcomed a baby girl.

This came as a surprise to fans, as the pair had kept Emmy's entire pregnancy a secret.

Emmy, 35, shared a picture of their little one‚Äôs teeny-tiny footprint.

‚ÄúOn a sunny Monday morning of 5.24.21 at 8:13AM, we welcomed our daughter into the world,‚Äù she captioned the post.

Their daughter's name is Samantha.

A number of stars took to the comments section to congratulate the new mother.

Riverdale's Lili Reinhart, wrote: "You look gorgeous üå∏‚ù§Ô∏è congratulations!"

Gossip Girl alum, Jessica Szohr, added: "Yes yes yes ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è."

Storm Reid simply said: "CONGRATULATIONS ‚ù§Ô∏è"
